title: 怎么让MOTD【彩色标语】显示图片换成自己的图片
author: coomP

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
用一张 32*32的图片
改名为Server-icon.png
放在根目录

replies.author: coomP
replies.txt_content:
